subject: Re: Request for a quote for updates to UK Stella Site

full_threads.body: Logged 1H to Harvest
@rica +1hr Thanks!

Hi David,

If you want to add a popup you, you can select the "Dynamic Tags" scroll down a bit an you will see popup.

After selecting popup, you need to click on the wrench icon then select the specific popup.

Thanks Joel

When I clear the link that is already in that box, I can't seem to find how to add the popup option shown with the 🔧 icon.

Best regards,

David

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

We are very close to going live with this new product and this could potentially be tomorrow (Wednesday) AM UK time.

Will keep you posted, but just wanted to give you a heads up and hope this will be possible,

Best regards,
Nat.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thats great news thanks so much for your help. We will be in touch when we know the definite go live date.

Best regards,
Nat.
Logged 45mins to Harvest

Hi David, 

Confirming we have now made the updates in the staging site and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the tasks completed:
  • Update Menu - Desktop & Mobile
  • New Popup (Click "Get a Quote" button in homepage)
  • New Quote Button homepage
  • Remove product matrix on homepage and replace with product lightboxes
  • Telematics Insurance page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/telematics-insurance/
  • Help page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/help-in-telematics/
  • Legal Page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/legal-inc-telematics/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi @rica done with the following updates

  • Update Menu - Desktop & Mobile
  • New Popup (Click "Get a Quote" button in homepage)
  • New Quote Button homepage
  • Remove product matrix on homepage and replace with product lightboxes
  • Telematics Insurance page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/telematics-insurance/
  • Help page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/help-in-telematics/
  • Legal Page - https://staging-withstella-staging.kinsta.cloud/legal-inc-telematics/

Time: +40mins

Thanks Chris

Couple of points.

Just to double confirm this is the Stella UK site and not Aus.

The new help page and legal page are already in the live site but just not published. Heath created these back in December and we have since updated the copy.

If you are going to do the updates in staging I would take a copy of the live site and port back to staging as this has the most up to date copy on it.

We do need the new navigation items created as as Nat says when the changes go live we will need to replace the current legal page with the legal page that references Telematics and the same for the help page, this will need to be replaced with the help page with telematics.

There are some other items such as the FAQs and a new Car Insurance page but we can publish those when required, it's more the Nav items and legal and help page addresses that we need help with.

Hope that helps and provide some context.

Thanks

David
